name: cursed (itch) (SB.Gary)
description:
A little puzzle/adventure game where you have to navigate through a level and escape. Collect items and powers to progress further!

  • Arrow keys to move
  • X Button - Interact pickups and switches.
    (Bound to X by default)
  • O Button - This works with one thing right now but I don't wanna spoil it.
    (Bound to Z/C by default)

Tons missing and a lot of bugs, but shippable. I need to go to sleep...
